cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ProgramName,ProductCategoryTitle,t.NodeSKUID,p.ProductName,SKUProductCustomerReferenceNumber,SKUValidUntil,p.ProgramID,p.CategoryID,p.CampaignsProductID FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined t INNER JOIN KDA_CampaignsProduct p ON t.DocumentForeignKeyValue=p.CampaignsProductID INNER JOIN COM_SKU s ON s.SKUID=t.NodeSKUID INNER JOIN KDA_ProductCategory c ON c.ProductCategoryID=p.CategoryID INNER JOIN KDA_Program pr ON pr.ProgramID=p.ProgramID WHERE p.ProgramID IS NOT NULL and t.ClassName='KDA.CampaignsProduct' and t.NodeSKUID IS NOT NULL and NodeParentID in (select NodeID FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined WHERE ClassName='KDA.Program' and ##where##)
